CHAT.comment: CHI and MIT are playing in the living room .
CHI and MIT are playing with a miniature cow and the tripod for the camera

u.a: brings a sheet of paper that shows some cartoon characters .
the faces of the characters appear when the blank circles are pencilled in
pencils in one of the circles
<aft> the face of Ampampan appears in the circle
points at a circle which seems to be Baikinman judging from the body
fills the circle with several pencil lines and stops
points at a different circle with the pencil
draws a few line in the circle
gives the pencil back to MIT
points at another circle with the pencil
pencils the circle but stops halfway
the character is called Meronpanna chan
puts a helicopter piece in the frame
<$=2> picks up a picture card of a train with hand and points at it with the other
flips a magazine to look for a picture of trains
points at a character called Unchidaimaoo
points at a sheet of stickers featuring Thomas and friends
rips sticker sheet off the magazine and gives it to CHI
helps CHI peel off a sticker
shows a picture of a railroad station in the magazine
points at the helicopter piece of the pattern matching toy
sticks Gordon on a rail in the picture
trying to peel off another sticker
trying to peel off another sticker
takes off the sticker and gives it to CHI
stares at the picture of the station
turns the page to see another picture of a railroad station
puts the sticker on the page
points at a train called Percy in the picture
points at something next to MIT
picks up a toy on his side and shows it to CHI
points at a different set of picture cards
shows another train sticker to CHI
puts the card on his cheek
a picture appears on the card when warmed up
looks at the picture of trains in the magazine
the pages are stuck because of a sticker

points at the snow in the picture
holding the train sticker with both hands and staring at it

takes the train piece and moves it around
takes a train card and moves it around

holds up the sticker over his head again
flips the sticker in front of MIT
points at the corner of the station

peels the sticker off and gives it to CHI
hands CHI another sticker with both hands
hands MIT one of the stickers
reaches for the sticker in MIT's hand
holds it out with both hands
puts the sticker on his left arm
puts another train sticker on his hand
Unchidaimaoo teaching children how to use the potty

points to the direction of the bathroom
points to the direction of the bathroom
picks up a toy on the floor

peels another sticker off the sheet

points at a third train sticker on MIT's hand
shows the helicpter shape of the pattern matching toy
takes one sticker from MIT's hand and puts it on the sticker sheet
sticks a train on MIT's jeans

transfers the stickers from MIT's hand to his jeans
hides the card behind his back
moves around and finds the card behind MIT
puts the cow on the top of the tripod
drops the from the top of the tripod
slides down the plastic foam wrapped around one of the legs of the tripod for protection
points at the wrapping down on the leg

drops the horse on the floor
points at a box of jigsaw puzzle on the floor
touches his hand with his other hand
supports his body by putting his hand on MIT's and stands up
turns the head of the tripod
peels off a train sticker from MIT's jeans
gives the sticker back to MIT

runs around MIT back to his seat
